about.title: Struggling to Find the Right Candidates?
about.description:
Traditional ATS systems fail to filter quality resumes because candidates now optimize their CVs with AI. You end up with a pile of applications that look great on paper but lack real relevance. Qorva AI changes the game. Our AI-powered resume screening solution analyzes resumes semantically, ranking applicants based on actual skills, experience, and job relevance. 
 Unlike traditional ATS, Qorva AI goes beyond keywords matching— it analyzes meaning and context to generate a matching score 
 and a detailed CV assessment report explaining why a candidate is a strong (or weak) fit.

parsing.title: AI-Powered Resume Parsing
parsing.description: Save time – No manual entry required! Simply drag & drop your resumes, and Qorva AI automatically extracts and stores candidate data in seconds.

matching.title: AI-Driven Candidate Matching
matching.description: Instantly rank candidates based on actual job relevance. Get detailed AI-powered reports explaining why a candidate is a strong (or weak) fit. Filter out unqualified resumes without lifting a finger.

aiChat.title: AI Resume Chat
aiChat.description: Stop wasting hours skimming resumes. With AI Resume Chat, you can instantly interact with any candidate’s profile, ask questions in plain English, and get deep insights that go far beyond job titles and keywords. Discover hidden strengths, spot red flags early, and confidently move the best candidates forward.

saveTime.title: Reduce Time to Hire
saveTime.description: Boost your productivity tenfold by eliminating tedious manual screening. Let Qorva AI handle the busywork, so you can focus on connecting with top-tier talent.

reduceCost.title: Cut Hiring Costs
reduceCost.description: Streamline your hiring process to significantly reduce costs. By slashing your time-to-hire, you'll free up valuable resources, giving you more time and budget for strategic initiatives.

accuracy.title: Enhance Hiring Accuracy and Quality
accuracy.description: Minimize costly mistakes. Our AI-driven candidate evaluation ensures precise, consistent matching, bringing clarity and confidence to your hiring decisions.

fairness.title: Promote Fairness in Hiring Process
fairness.description: Eliminate unconscious biases in your recruitment process. Ensure your hiring decisions remain objective, equitable, and free from discrimination based on race, gender, religion, or sexual orientation.
